page.title: Auth0 Profile Page
page.introduction: When Login is selected at first use, the user is redirected to the AuthO Profile page to create a user profile and complete creating an Auth0 account. A VCell username is required to access all the functionality of VCell. The VCell username will then be mapped to an Auth0 login account.
page.operations:
Existing Users need to provide the username and password of their existing VCell account.
Select Forgot my password if you have forgotten your password. Provide the username and associated email of the account and an email will be sent with a link that will immediately approve linking the VCell account to an Auth0 account. If you do not remember both old username and email, contact VCell Support
New VCell Users need to create a username and provide a valid email address. VCell usernames are case-sensitive. Click the checkbox at the bottom of the registration dialog if you wish to decline receiving VCell notification emails.
Once a unique VCell Username is applied, a new Auth0 account is created and you are directed to a Success Auth0 profile page. Simply close the page and return to VCell. A message saying Failed to map new user, please try again will appear if the username provided is already in use. Pick a new one and try again.
